This is the sum total of the annual tuition fees and annual faculty salary cost for the duration of the education of each cadre. This is calculated using unit costs from the pre-service worksforce costing done from the HSSP-III. File used - "MTAP Intervention Costing Tool_08082023_clean_BASELINE_inflated_newscholarship#s_pharmacySAhardcoaded.xlsx (CA version)". See ' raw_preservice_unit_costs' tab. We assume that infrastructure and equipment costs are small when spread over the long duration and number of students over which they are used.
